summary: Phase 1 testing complete. All backend APIs pass (22/22). Frontend UI works correctly - Cricket page shows live match, prediction buttons work, Earn page Watch Ads tab displays correctly.

minor.issue: Returns empty if no predictions - expected behavior but UI shows 'No predictions yet' placeholder

critical_code_review_comments: bcrypt warning in logs (AttributeError: module 'bcrypt' has no attribute '__about__') - passlib version compatibility, not blocking functionality
React Hook useEffect dependency warning in AuthContext.js - minor lint warning, doesn't affect functionality
seed_data_creation: Used existing test user from provided credentials. IPL 2026 mock matches auto-seeded by backend.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend tests cover: Cricket matches API, live matches, ball predictions, match predictions, leaderboard, ad config/status/reward, gift cards. Frontend tests verify: Login flow, Cricket page navigation, prediction buttons, Watch Ads tab. Mock data note: Cricket outcomes are simulated randomly for demo; AdMob uses 3-second delay simulation.

features_tested.cricket_matches_api: PASS - GET /api/cricket/matches returns 7 IPL 2026 mock matches
features_tested.live_match_api: PASS - GET /api/cricket/matches/live returns 1 live match (CSK vs MI)
features_tested.ball_prediction: PASS - POST /api/cricket/predict/ball creates prediction and awards coins
features_tested.ad_config_api: PASS - GET /api/ads/config returns {enabled: true, reward_coins: 50, max_per_day: 5}
features_tested.ad_status_api: PASS - GET /api/ads/status returns daily ad status for user
features_tested.ad_reward_api: PASS - POST /api/ads/reward claims 50 coins (tested with cooldown)
features_tested.gift_cards_available: PASS - GET /api/gift-cards/available returns grouped options (empty until admin uploads)
features_tested.cricket_page_ui: PASS - Shows live match, 8 prediction buttons, leaderboard, upcoming matches
features_tested.earn_page_watch_ads: PASS - Shows ad status, watch button, daily progress
features_tested.navigation: PASS - Cricket link in navbar navigates correctly

mocked_apis_verified.cricket_match_data: Uses mock IPL 2026 fixtures (CSK vs MI is live)
mocked_apis_verified.ball_prediction_outcomes: Randomly simulated - prediction works, outcomes are random
mocked_apis_verified.admob_integration: Simulates 3-second ad watch delay - reward claiming works
